user.title: Honeywell TCC Resilient
user.description:
Enter your mytotalconnectcomfort.com credentials.

Your credentials are stored locally on your Home Assistant and are only used to communicate with Honeywell's servers.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate with Honeywell
reauth_confirm.description: Your session has expired. Please enter your password to reconnect.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication - check your email and password
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Honeywell servers
error.rate_limited: Rate limited by Honeywell - please wait a few minutes
